text: Olumide Makanjuola is a human rights activist and supporter of LGBT rights. Makanjuola was the director of The Initiative for Equal rights (TIERS)https://theinitiativeforequalrights.org/ and is the program director for Initiative Sankofa d’Afrique de l’Ouest (ISDAO) which supports grants to LGBTQ communities in West Africa improving LGBT rights and safety. In 2016 Makanjuola was given a Queen's Young Leaders Award for work for the LGBTQ community. == References == Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Nigerian LGBT people Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Olumide Makanjuola
